page.title: 18EVENTS
page.content: GREAT EXCITMENT WAS FELT IN THE AREA AT THE TIME OF THE PARLIMENTARY BY-ELECTION TO REPLACE THE CONSERVATIVE TOM HOOSAN. THIS WAS HERALDED BY THE NATIONAL PRESS AS A FORE-TASTE OF THE NEXT GENERAL ELECTION AND THEREFORE OF GREAT INTEREST. NEVER BEFORE HAVE SO FEW PEOPLE BEEN WOOED BY SO MANY PUBLIC FIGURES. THE LABOUR CANDIDATE, DR WHILLEY AND THE ALLIANCE CANDIDATE MR R. LIVESLEY, IN PARTICULAR INUNDATED THE AREA WITH THEIR SUPPORTERS AND PAMPHLETS IN ORDER TO CANVASS THE VOTERS. SCREAMING LORD SUTCH AND THE PLAID CYMRU CANDIDATE SEEMED TO HAVE MORE INFLUENCE THAN THE CONSERVATIVE CANDIDATE AND SATISFACTION WAS APPARENT WHEN THE ALLIANCE CANDIDATE WON THE SEAT
